title: "Trait bounds were not satisfied" error when trait bound already specified.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
I have generic trait implementation in my code and when I tried this code: ```rust #[async_trait] impl <'a, T,K, S> MyTrait for S where T: sqlx::Row + sqlx::FromRow<'a, sqlx::mysql::MySqlRow> { async fn find_by_key(conn: &MySqlPool, key: &K) -> Result, Error> { let mut query_builder: QueryBuilder = QueryBuilder::new(r#"..."#); query_builder.push("..."); let mut query = query_builder.build_query_as::(); // <--- this is where I suspect the error happnened first let mut rows: Vec = query.fetch_all(conn).await?; // <--- This is where the red line appear below `fetch_all` } } ``` I expected to see this happen: compiler compiled the code successfully Instead, this happened: I got the error: > the method fetch_all exists for struct QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments>, but its trait bound were not satisfied the following trait bounds were not satisfied: T: FromRow<'r, MySqlRow> ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0-nightly (e972bc808 2023-01-29) binary: rustc commit-hash: e972bc8083d5228536dfd42913c8778b6bb04c8e commit-date: 2023-01-29 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.69.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ```
Backtrace

``` error[E0599]: the method fetch_all exists for struct QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments>, but its trait bounds were not satisfied --> src/db/common.rs:194:38 | 194 | let mut rows: Vec = query.fetch_all(conn).await?; | ^^^^^^^^^ method cannot be called on QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments> due to unsatisfied trait bounds | = note: the following trait bounds were not satisfied: T: FromRow<'r, MySqlRow> error[E0599]: the method fetch_all exists for struct QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments>, but its trait bounds were not satisfied --> src/db/common.rs:226:38 | 226 | let mut rows: Vec = query.fetch_all(conn).await?; | ^^^^^^^^^ method cannot be called on QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments> due to unsatisfied trait bounds | = note: the following trait bounds were not satisfied: T: FromRow<'r, MySqlRow> error[E0599]: the method fetch_all exists for struct QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments>, but its trait bounds were not satisfied --> src/db/common.rs:263:38 | 263 | let mut rows: Vec = query.fetch_all(conn).await?; | ^^^^^^^^^ method cannot be called on QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments> due to unsatisfied trait bounds | = note: the following trait bounds were not satisfied: T: FromRow<'r, MySqlRow> error[E0599]: the method fetch_all exists for struct QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments>, but its trait bounds were not satisfied --> src/db/common.rs:424:38 | 424 | let mut rows: Vec = query.fetch_all(conn).await?; | ^^^^^^^^^ method cannot be called on QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments> due to unsatisfied trait bounds | = note: the following trait bounds were not satisfied: T: FromRow<'r, MySqlRow> error[E0599]: the method fetch_one exists for struct QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments>, but its trait bounds were not satisfied --> src/db/common.rs:453:31 | 453 | let target: T = query.fetch_one(conn).await?; | ^^^^^^^^^ method cannot be called on QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments> due to unsatisfied trait bounds | = note: the following trait bounds were not satisfied: T: FromRow<'r, MySqlRow> error[E0599]: the method fetch_one exists for struct QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments>, but its trait bounds were not satisfied --> src/db/common.rs:480:35 | 480 | let new_target: T = query.fetch_one(conn).await?; | ^^^^^^^^^ method cannot be called on QueryAs<'_, MySql, T, MySqlArguments> due to unsatisfied trait bounds | = note: the following trait bounds were not satisfied: T: FromRow<'r, MySqlRow> For more information about this error, try rustc --explain E0599. ```
